name: Let's Fight! Box
description:
Survivor class bullet screen game, ever-changing entries, different entries combined into a card, more than 10,000 combinations, there are 5 kinds of small bosses, randomly appear on the battlefield, bringing different experiences. Two modes, a normal mode: about 10 minutes, survivor +boss rhythm level, a boss trial mode: about 5 minutes, experience the boss blast barrage. Support runes, choosing the right rune for you before battle may be the key to victory. During the game, you will experience several super boss trial levels,
The boss's random and varied gorgeous barrage skills may make you overwhelmed, and the proper use of the sprint ability (space button) can get you out of trouble, but pay attention to the blue energy bar. Each time you lose or win a battle, you will earn a certain number of gems. Use the gems to unlock more runes! Let's fight! Box!!
